729825f-a.title: Richmond: Victory Boulevard - Church Avenue
729825f-a.text:
(1)
3980 Victory Boulevard, adjoining the S.E. corner of Church Avenue, showing the Dickinson Methodist Episcopal
Church.
P. L. Sperr  May 19, 1932
(2)
The church and parsoaage, seen from Church Avenue.
May 19, 1932
P. L. Sperr

729826f-a.title: Richmond: Victory Boulevard - Church Avenue
729826f-a.text:
3994 Victory Boulevard, east side, between Church
Avenue and Burke Avenue, showing an old house which,according to Butler's 1853 map, belonged to a member of the Decker family. In 1874 it was owned by B. Decker and in 1898 by W. P. Cannon. Butler's and Beers's maps of 1853 and 1874 respectively show this area (Travisville) to have been resided in by numerous members
of the Decker family.
May 19, 1932
P. L. Sperr
729826f-a.folder: Victory Boulevard & Church Avenue, Staten Island, NY

729839f-a.title: Richmond: Victory Boulevard - Church Avenue
729839f-a.text:
Victory Boulevard, at the N.E. corner of Charch Avenue. The maps of 1874 and 1898 show the house to have belonged to Mrs. Paul. In 1907 it was owned by D. D. Decker
May 19, 1932
P. L. Sperr
